SELECT t0.id, t0.account_head_id, t0.code, t0.created_at, t0.created_by, t0.is_deleted, t0.name, t1.id, t1.code, t1.created_at, t1.created_by, t1.is_deleted, t1.name, t1.percentage, t1.tax_master_id

    WHERE NOT (t.is_deleted) AND t.id = @__taxMasterId_0

) AS t0

ORDER BY t0.id

    SELECT t.id, t.account_head_id, t.code, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.is_deleted, t.name

@mt: Route matched with {RouteData}. Executing controller action with signature {MethodInfo} on controller {Controller} ({AssemblyName}).

commandText:
SELECT t0.id, t0.account_head_id, t0.code, t0.created_at, t0.created_by, t0.is_deleted, t0.name, t1.id, t1.code, t1.created_at, t1.created_by, t1.is_deleted, t1.name, t1.percentage, t1.tax_master_id
FROM (
    SELECT t.id, t.account_head_id, t.code, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.is_deleted, t.name
    FROM fin_data.tax_masters AS t
    WHERE NOT (t.is_deleted) AND t.id = @__taxMasterId_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN fin_data.taxes AS t1 ON t0.id = t1.tax_master_id
ORDER BY t0.id

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.created_at, t.created_by, t.is_deleted, t.name, t.percentage, t.tax_master_id
FROM fin_data.taxes AS t
WHERE t.tax_master_id = @__taxMasterId_0
